channel.title: Stall Dc's players. (Please help me ASAP!)

item.title: Stall Dc's players. (Please help me ASAP!)
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

Hello, I’m having trouble with my stalls. Whenever a normal player tries to theiv it, it lags them. Then dc’s them. But if you are any kind of staff it doesn’t do that. Here is my theif method…

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(0x340); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM(message); addItem(item, itemAmount); addSkillXP(XPamount, 17); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); } }

Could someone please help me ASAP? I can’t let this happen for much longer.
Thanks
~Czar

Read full topic
